register.name: magicNumber
register.description: Fixed to 0xA1

register.name: version
register.description: Set to 1 for this implementation

register.name: configOption
register.description: Simplified - 0x00, Full - 0xFF - Must be 0xFF in this case

bit_field_value.name: XMCD_SEMC_SDRAM_CONFIG_FULL
bit_field_value.description: Full configuration. Must configure all fields.

register.name: clkMhz
register.description: Set the working frequency in the unit of MHz

register.name: sdramSizeKb
register.description: Set the memory size of SDRAM CS0 in the unit of kilobytes. Range: 0x0000_0004~0x0040_0000, i.e. 4~4*1024*1024 kilobytes.

register.name: portSize
register.description: Port size of SDRAM: 0 - 8-bit, 1 - 16-bit, 2 - 32-bit

register.name: pinConfigPull
register.description: Pull config of the SDRAM GPIO pin: 0 - Forbidden, 1 - Pull up, 2 - Pull down, 3 - No pull, Others - Invalid value

bit_field.name: pinConfigPull
bit_field.description: Pull config of the SDRAM GPIO pin

register.name: pinConfigDriveStrength
register.description: Driver config of SDRAM GPIO pin: 0 - High driver, 1 - Normal driver, Others - Invalid value

bit_field.name: pinConfigDriveStrength
bit_field.description: Driver config of SDRAM GPIO pin

register.name: muxRdy
register.description: SDRAM CSn device selection: 1 - SDRAM CS1, 2 - SDRAM CS2, 3 - SDRAM CS3, Others - Invalid for SDRAM, select other external devices

register.name: muxCsx0
register.description: SDRAM CSn device selection: 1 - SDRAM CS1, 2 - SDRAM CS2, 3 - SDRAM CS3, Others - Invalid for SDRAM, select other external devices

register.name: muxCsx1
register.description: SDRAM CSn device selection: 1 - SDRAM CS1, 2 - SDRAM CS2, 3 - SDRAM CS3, Others - Invalid for SDRAM, select other external devices

register.name: muxCsx2
register.description: SDRAM CSn device selection: 1 - SDRAM CS1, 2 - SDRAM CS2, 3 - SDRAM CS3, Others - Invalid for SDRAM, select other external devices

register.name: muxCsx3
register.description: SDRAM CSn device selection: 1 - SDRAM CS1, 2 - SDRAM CS2, 3 - SDRAM CS3, Others - Invalid for SDRAM, select other external devices

register.name: bank
register.description: Bank numbers of SDRAM device: 0 - 4 banks, 1 - 2 banks, Others - Invalid value

register.name: burstLen
register.description: Burst length: 0 - 1, 1 - 2, 2 - 4, 3 - 8, Others - Invalid value

register.name: columnAddrBitNum
register.description: Column address bit number: 0 - 12 bit, 1 - 11 bit, 2 - 10 bit, 3 - 9 bit, 4 - 8 bit, Others - Invalid value

register.name: casLatency
register.description: CAS Latency: 1 - 1, 2 - 2, 3 - 3, Others - Invalid value

register.name: writeRecoveryNs
register.description: Write recovery time in unit of nanosecond. This could help to meet tWR timing requirement by the SDRAM device.

register.name: refreshRecoveryNs
register.description: Refresh recovery time in unit of nanosecond. This could help to meet tRFC timing requirement by the SDRAM device.

register.name: act2readwriteNs
register.description: Act to read/write wait time in unit of nanosecond. This could help to meet tRCD timing requirement by the SDRAM device.

register.name: precharge2actNs
register.description: Precharge to active wait time in unit of nanosecond. This could help to meet tRP timing requirement by SDRAM device.

register.name: act2actBanksNs
register.description: Active to active wait time between two different banks in unit of nanosecond. This could help to meet tRRD timing requirement by the SDRAM device.

register.name: refresh2refreshNs
register.description: Auto refresh to auto refresh wait time in unit of nanosecond. This could help to meet tRFC timing requirement by the SDRAM device.

register.name: selfrefRecoveryNs
register.description: Self refresh recovery time in unit of nanosecond. This could help to meet tXSR timing requirement by the SDRAM device.

register.name: act2prechargeMinNs
register.description: ACT to Precharge minimum time in unit of nanosecond. This could help to meet tRAS(max) timing requirement by the SDRAM device.

register.name: act2prechargeMaxNs
register.description: ACT to Precharge maximum time in unit of nanosecond. This could help to meet tRAS(max) timing requirement by the SDRAM device.

register.name: refreshperiodPerrowNs
register.description: Refresh timer period in unit of nanosecond. Set to (tREF(ms) * 1000000/rows) value.

register.name: modeRegister
register.description: Define the specific mode of operation of SDRAM. Set to the value required by SDRAM device.

register.name: sdram0Base
register.description: Base address of SDRAM CS0. Range: 0x8000_0000~0xDFFF_FFFF.

register.name: sdram1Base
register.description: Base address of SDRAM CS1. Range: 0x8000_0000~0xDFFF_FFFF. If CS1 is not being used, set the address to 0.

register.name: sdram2Base
register.description: Base address of SDRAM CS2. Range: 0x8000_0000~0xDFFF_FFFF. If CS2 is not being used, set the address to 0.

register.name: sdram3Base
register.description: Base address of SDRAM CS3. Range: 0x8000_0000~0xDFFF_FFFF. If CS3 is not being used, set the address to 0.

register.name: sdram1SizeKb
register.description: Set the memory size of SDRAM CS1 in unit of kbytes. Range: 0x0000_0004~0x0040_0000, i.e. 4~4*1024*1024 kilobytes.

register.name: sdram2SizeKb
register.description: Set the memory size of SDRAM CS2 in unit of kbytes. Range: 0x0000_0004~0x0040_0000, i.e. 4~4*1024*1024 kilobytes.

register.name: sdram3SizeKb
register.description: Set the memory size of SDRAM CS3 in unit of kbytes. Range: 0x0000_0004~0x0040_0000, i.e. 4~4*1024*1024 kilobytes.
